findings.title: Owner privileges (In the period when the owner is not renounced)
findings.description: The contract owner has excessive privileges to modify critical settings and withdraw tokens, which can lead to unintended consequences if the owner's account is compromised.

findings.title: Master can rebase
findings.description: The master has the privilege to rebase, which can lead to potential security risks.

findings.title: Owner can change sellMultiplier
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to modify the sellMultiplier variable, which could lead to unintended consequences.

findings.title: Owner can change trading and launch status
findings.description: The owner has privileges to change trading and launch status which could lead to potential security risks.

findings.title: Owner can change blacklist mode
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to change the blacklist mode, which could lead to unauthorized access or manipulation.

findings.title: Owner can change maxRoomRent value
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to modify the maxRoomRent value, which could lead to potential security risks.

findings.title: Owner can change cooldown settings
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to modify cooldown settings, which could lead to potential security risks.

findings.title: Owner can change pair address
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to change the pair address.

findings.title: Owner can change master address
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to change the master address.

findings.title: Owner can withdraw BEP20 tokens
findings.description: The contract owner has the privilege to withdraw BEP20 tokens.

findings.title: Owner can change _maxWalletToken and _maxTxAmount
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to modify _maxWalletToken and _maxTxAmount variables.

findings.title: Owner can multiTransfer fixed and listed token amounts
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to transfer multiple fixed and listed token amounts, which could lead to potential security risks.

findings.title: Authorized addresses can withdraw contract BNBs
findings.description: Authorized addresses have the privilege to withdraw contract BNBs without any restrictions.

findings.title: Authorized addresses can include in and exclude from dividends
findings.description: Authorized addresses have the ability to modify dividend distribution, which could lead to unintended consequences.

findings.title: Authorized addresses can include in and exclude from fee, timelock and transaction amount
findings.description: Authorized addresses have excessive privileges to modify critical contract settings, including fees, timelocks, and transaction amounts.

findings.title: Authorized addresses can change fees
findings.description: Authorized addresses have the ability to modify fee settings.

findings.title: Authorized addresses can change fee receivers
findings.description: Authorized addresses have the ability to modify fee receivers, which could lead to unauthorized changes and potential security risks.

findings.title: Authorized addresses can change swap threshold and disable/enable swap
findings.description: Authorized addresses have the privilege to modify swap settings, which could lead to unintended consequences.

findings.title: Authorized addresses can change targetLiquidity
findings.description: Authorized addresses have the ability to modify target liquidity settings.

findings.title: Authorized addresses can change distribution criteria
findings.description: Authorized addresses have the privilege to modify distribution criteria, which may lead to unintended consequences.

findings.title: Authorized addresses can change distribution GAS
findings.description: Authorized addresses have the privilege to modify distribution gas settings.
